name: Penguin Color Bubble Pop
description:
Here is some bubbling fun challenging bubble shoot game that you can enjoy with your friends!
If you feel like poping out some bubbles and you want to relax, this is the challenge you've been waiting for!
Better than any pop-up or matching game you might have played until now, this time you'll get a big canon which you'll have to use in order to shoot down all the colored bubbles in the stage. Every level comes with its obstacles and you might get to find them more difficult or hard to clear, but with skill, patience and other qualities that you might have, surely will be no problem for you!

These penguins are pretty impressive at targeting and shooting bubbles, so you can relay on them for the job, even more, here you'll get to discover all kind of bonuses which can help you clear the levels in real time.
Join in and you'll find a big map, with more than 50 levels which you'll have to pass, with different puzzles at each stage, this surely will get you intrigued. Prove that you have the skill to pass each one and make sure to calculate your moves perfectly or you might end up loosing a life!

With high quallity graphics, lots of sound effects and an exciting game play this bubble popper puzzle app will remain on your mobile device for a while. Share the app with your friends and find out who can score better!
